LanguageData.MessageRaidersDetectedEarlyAssault: {1} den gelen {0} seni fark etti ve saldırısına erken başladı.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersKidnapping: {1} den gelen {0} kaçırabileceklerini kaçırmaya karar verdi ve ayrıldı.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersStealing: {0} from {1} have decided to steal what they can and leave.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersGivenUpLeaving: {1} den gelen {0} pes ettiler ve ayrılıyorlar.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersSatisfiedLeaving: {1} den gelen {0} verdikleri hasarla tatmin oldular ve ayrılıyorlar.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsTakingWounded: {1} den gelen {0} yaralı bir ziyaretçi alıyor.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsTrappedLeaving: {1} den gelen {0} tuzağa düştü ve kaçmak için yeri kazıyor.

LanguageData.MessageOutOfNearbyShellsFor: {0} found no nearby unreserved shells for {1}.

LanguageData.MessageTameAndNameSuccess: {0}, {1}'i başarıyla ehlileştirildi ({2} şans) ve ona {3} ismini verdi.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestable: Hasat edilebilir, yeterince büyümüş bitkiler belirlenmelidir.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestableWood: Kereste verebilen, yeterince büyümüş ağaçlar belirlenmelidir.
LanguageData.MessageAlreadyInStorage: Bu zaten depoda var eğer gerekirse yüksek öncelikli depoya taşınacak.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateStrippable: Ölü veya baygın karakter'in soyulabilir kıyafetleri belirlenmelidir.
LanguageData.MessageTooLowMedCare: İşlem {0} veya daha iyisini gerektiriyor, ama {1}'in şuanki tıbbi bakım modu "{2}".
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureCatastroph: {0}, {1} üzerinde operasyon yaparken felaket şekilde başarısız oldu.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureMinor: {0}, {1} üzerinde operasyon yaparken biraz başarısız oldu.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureRidiculous: {0} has failed in a ridiculous way while operating on {1}.
LanguageData.MessagePawnExitMapRelationsGain: Çünkü {0} haritadan sağlıklı olarak çıktı, {1} ile ilişkiler {2} oldu.
LanguageData.MessageNoHandlerSkilledEnough: {0}'ı ehlileştirecek eğitmen yok (gereken seviye {2}'de {1}, en iyi eğitmen {3} seviye {4}).
LanguageData.MessageHiveReproduced: Bir böcek kovanı kendini yeniden kurdu.
LanguageData.MessageNewlyMarried: {0} ve {1} evlendiler. Kolonidekiler şimdi bu olayı kutluyor.

LanguageData.MessageCannotSellItemsReason: Bazı öğeler şu nedenle takas edilemez:
LanguageData.MessageConstructionFailed: {1}, {0}'yi inşa ederken başarısız oldu. Bazı kaynaklar israf edildi.
LanguageData.MessageFailedToSendCaravanBecausePawnLos: Failed to send the caravan because one of the colonists, prisoners or animals has been lost.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanFormationPaused: The caravan formation process will continue when everyone recovers from a mental break.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanFormationUnpaused: Your colonists will now continue forming a caravan.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanMemberHasExtremeMentalBrea: One of the caravan members has a mental break.
LanguageData.MessageMaxPlanetCoveragePerformanceWarni: Warning: It can take a very long time to generate an entire planet.
LanguageData.MessagePlantDiedOfRot: {0} has died from rotting due to being left unharvested.

LanguageData.MessagePawnLeftMapAndCreatedCaravan: {0} has left the area and formed a caravan.
LanguageData.MessageSettledInExistingMap: You have successfully settled in a new area.
LanguageData.MessageAmbushVictory: Victory! In {0} hours, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
LanguageData.MessageAutomaticallyReformedCaravan: Your colonists have reformed the caravan.
LanguageData.MessageRescueeJoined: Since you rescued [PAWN_objective], {0} has joined your group!
LanguageData.MessageAttackedCaravanIsNowHostile: Because you attacked a caravan of {0}, this faction is now hostile to you.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersNotAdjacent: All pod launchers connected to the selected transport pods must be adjacent.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_Transpor: The loading process has been canceled because one of the transport pods has been destroyed.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_FuelingP: The loading process has been canceled because one of the pod launchers has been destroyed.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadingProcessStarted: Your colonists will now load the assigned items into the transport pods.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndLost: Your transport pods have arrived, but since there were no colonists inside, the contents are lost.
LanguageData.MessageFailedToLoadTransportersBecauseCo: The loading process has been canceled because one of the colonists has been lost.
LanguageData.MessageFinishedLoadingTransporters: Your colonists have finished loading the transport pods.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsDestinationIsTooFar: Each pod launcher would need at least {0}x chemfuel to send transport pods that far.
LanguageData.MessageCantAbandonLastColonist: You can't abandon the last colonist.
LanguageData.MessageCantEquipIncapableOfViolence: Cannot equip: {0} is incapable of violence.
LanguageData.MessageSlaughteringBondedAnimal: Because they are bonded, slaughtering {0} will make {1} unhappy.
LanguageData.MessageSelectOwnBaseToFormCaravan: To form a caravan, select your own colony or a site where you have people.
LanguageData.MessageScreenResTooSmallForUIScale: At this resolution and UI scale, the game interface would not fit on-screen. Please reduce UI scale or increase resolution.

MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndAddedToCar: Your transport pods have arrived. The contents have been added to your caravan.
MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseLimit: You can't add more than {0} waypoints.
MessageCantDoExecutionBecauseNoWardenCap: None of your wardens is capable of violence. The execution won't be performed.

MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoEnemiesInit: In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
MessageCannotSelfTendEver: {0} is incapable of doing Doctor work, and so cannot ever self-tend.
MessageYouHaveToReformCaravanNow: You have to reform the caravan now. Everyone left behind will be abandoned.
MessageVisitorsDangerousTemperature: {0} from {1} are leaving the map because of dangerous temperature.
MessageSelfTendUnsatisfied: To self-tend, {0} must also be assigned to Doctor work.
MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoMoreEnemies: You have defeated all enemies. In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed.
MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseUnreachable: It's not possible to reach this tile from the last waypoint.
